Survey Instructions

Please read these instructions carefully before beginning:

elements.name: response_guidelines
elements.html:
How to Respond:

  1. Read each question carefully - Take your time to understand what is being asked
  2. Answer honestly - There are no right or wrong answers, we want your genuine opinion
  3. Complete all required questions - Questions marked with an asterisk (*) must be answered
  4. Use the navigation buttons - Click 'Next' to proceed or 'Previous' to go back

elements.name: technical_notes
elements.html:
Technical Notes:

  • Your progress is automatically saved as you complete each page
  • You can return to previous pages to review or change your answers
  • If you experience technical difficulties, please refresh the page
  • The survey works best on desktop computers and tablets

Ready to begin? Click 'Next' to start the survey.
